blessing: May all your days be filled with Light.
discoverTitle: Uncover new and amazing things with Deen AI
learnHadithText: Find light and guidance for how you feel, see, through the Quran or Hadith.
startReflecting: Start reflecting on verses to see them here
reflectionMessage: Write what this verse means to you...
editReflectionMessage: Update your thoughts on this verse...
reflectBox: Share your thoughts, insights, or personal reflections on this verse...
reflectSuccessText: Your reflection has been added to your journal, a space you can return to anytime for peace and remembrance.
startReflectionJourney: Start your reflection journey by adding thoughts on Quranic verses
deleteReflectionQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete your reflection?
profileGreetings: May all your days be filled with Light.
deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your Account?
warning1: Once you delete your account, it cannot be undone. All your data will permanently be erased from this app, including your profile information, preferences, saved content, and any activity history.
warning2: We're sad to see you go, but we understand that sometimes it's necessary. Please take a moment to consider the consequences before proceeding.
